stimulusHtml: Northern City Bank keeps no excess reserves. Assume Northern City Bank receives a cash deposit of $50 dollars. As a result of the deposit, Northern City Bankâ€™s required reserves increase by $10. What is the maximum possible change in the money supply in the banking system that could result from the $50 deposit?
choicesHtml:
The money supply will increase by a maximum of $10.

The money supply will increase by a maximum of $40.

The money supply will increase by a maximum of $50.

The money supply will increase by a maximum of $200.

The money supply will increase by a maximum of $250.
